title: As a BOC User, I want the Approaching Player Email to Include Date Player Will Become Overdue
custom_preconds:
status Related to: https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/166390197

AC:
 - The text of the "Player Approaching" emails will be updated to include the date the player will become Overdue
 - The Text of the email will now read:
**Subject:** Player Approaching!
**Content:** Prospect [Last, First] is currently checked in and approaching the permissible length of stay at a Club facility.  As of [Date player is schedule to become Overdue], the player will be considered Overdue.  Please log into AMT to review."

title: As a BOC User, I want a BOC Only Comments Box on AMT Prospect Profiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN  user is logged in as a BOC USER 
AND    has navigated to 'Prospects' page dashboard
AC:
 - At the bottom of the Prospect Profile in AMT, there will be a BOC Comments box
 - This comments box will only visible and editable to BOC Users
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects AMT player (any player will do)
AND scrolls to bottom of page
custom_expected:
THEN  AMT player profile page will open
AND   BOC user can view and edit "BOC Comments" box

title: As an AMT user I want clicking a nav link on mobile to close the mobile nav
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is viewing a nav link

AC:
* Clicking on a mobile nav link closes the mobile nav and redirects to the link clicked.
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on mobile nav link
custom_expected: THEN  mobile nav will close and redirect to link
